com.nxp.id.jcopx
Interface ECPoint

All Superinterfaces:
javacard.security.ECKey, javacard.security.ECPublicKey, javacard.security.Key, javacard.security.PublicKey
public interface ECPoint
extends javacard.security.ECPublicKey

The interface ECPoint defines and provides methods that can be used to generate Java Card objects that implement JCOP specific EC algorithms. This interface inherits all set and get methods available in ECPublicKey. A new method for elliptic curve point addition over GF(p) is implemented. The first operand is set using the setW() method. The second operand is passed via a byte array bufferto addPoint. The operands are in the format of uncompressed points 04 | X | Y .

Method Summary
 void addPoint(byte[] buffer, short offset, short length)
          Adds the operand in buffer to the operand in field W of the ECPoint object.

Method Detail

addPoint

void addPoint(byte[] buffer,
              short offset,
              short length)
Adds the operand in buffer to the operand in field W of the ECPoint object.

Parameters:
buffer - byte array containing the point to be added to ECPoint
offset - offset in to the point in buffer
length - length of the point
Throws:
CryptoException - with the following reason codes:
  • ILLEGAL_VALUE if the operand is not formatted as uncompressed point.
  • ILLEGAL_VALUE if the length in incorrect.
  • UNINITIALIZED_KEY if the point is not initialized similar to public key.
  • ILLEGAL_USE if the result of addition is the neutral point.
